con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="CommentsAndAttachments"/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="Copy of createAndDownloadAttachment"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:method.name: Create Discussion withou files and tags

con:config.methodName: Create Discussion withou files and tags
Create Discussion withou files and tags
Create Discussion withou files and tags

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.*
def response = context.expand( '${List Discussions#Response}' ).toString() def jsonResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def globalParentEdited = 'PARENT_EDITED';
jsonResponse[0].name = 'Name editado' jsonResponse[0].description = 'Description editado' jsonResponse[0].globalParent = globalParentEdited jsonResponse[0].date = new Date().getTime()
def content = [content: jsonResponse[0], attachmentsToCreate : [], attachmentsToDelete : []]
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("discussionEdited", new JsonBuilder(content).toString()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("globalParentEdited", globalParentEdited)

con:configuration.scriptText: def val = messageExchange.getResponseHeaders()["Content-Disposition"][0] def fileName = new File(context.expand('${#Project#URI_attachment_file}')).name assert val == "attachment; filename=$fileName"
